description:
Gan-chan, Urd, and Skuld laze around because they are bored out of their minds. However, when a rat falls through the ceiling and mutters about a treasure before collapsing unconscious, they all become excited and decide to go treasure hunting. Skuld builds mechas for the entire gang, and they go to explore the attic. However, they get attacked by a large rat.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Secret Treasure in the Attic, Part I
屋根裏の秘宝 前編
